description: The user asks for a visual markdown summary of today’s top tech news with headlines, sources, and relevance scores, which the assistant generates by fetching RSS feeds, extracting and summarizing content, ranking articles based on the user’s interests, and finally emailing the compiled table to the subscriber.

messages.content: You are an AI assistant for a Personalized News Digest service. You can fetch RSS feeds, extract article text, summarize articles, rank them against a user interest profile, and email a markdown‑formatted digest.
Hey, can you give me a visual summary of today’s top tech news? I’d like a markdown table with the headline, source, and a brief relevance score, and please email it to me at alice@example.com.
Fetching the latest articles from your favorite tech sources…

[{"title":"AI‑Powered Coding Assistants Are Changing Development","link":"https://www.nytimes.com/2025/12/06/technology/ai-coding-assistants.html","publish_date":"2025-12-06"},{"title":"Google Announces New Cloud Security Suite","link":"https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2025/12/google-cloud-security-suite/","publish_date":"2025-12-06"},{"title":"The Verge’s Review of the Latest Snapdragon Chip","link":"https://www.theverge.com/2025/12/06/snapdragon-review","publish_date":"2025-12-06"}]
Extracting the full text for each article…

Full text of NYTimes article about AI‑powered coding assistants. The piece discusses how large language models are being integrated into IDEs, improving developer productivity, and mentions major companies releasing beta tools.

Full text of Ars Technica article on Google’s new Cloud Security Suite. It explains the suite’s features, including AI‑driven threat detection, zero‑trust networking, and tighter integration with GCP services.
Full text of The Verge review of the latest Snapdragon chip. The review covers performance benchmarks, AI capabilities, power efficiency, and how the chip will affect smartphones in 2026.

arguments.text: Full text of NYTimes article about AI‑powered coding assistants. The piece discusses how large language models are being integrated into IDEs, improving developer productivity, and mentions major companies releasing beta tools.

Full text of Ars Technica article on Google’s new Cloud Security Suite. It explains the suite’s features, including AI‑driven threat detection, zero‑trust networking, and tighter integration with GCP services.
Full text of The Verge review of the latest Snapdragon chip. The review covers performance benchmarks, AI capabilities, power efficiency, and how the chip will affect smartphones in 2026.

messages.content: AI‑powered coding assistants are now embedded in popular IDEs, promising faster development cycles and reduced bugs.
Google’s new Cloud Security Suite uses AI to detect threats in real time and enforces zero‑trust policies across GCP.
The latest Snapdragon chip delivers a 30% performance boost and advanced AI processing for next‑gen smartphones.
Ranking the articles according to your interests (AI, cloud, cybersecurity)…

summaries: AI‑powered coding assistants are now embedded in popular IDEs, promising faster development cycles and reduced bugs.
Google’s new Cloud Security Suite uses AI to detect threats in real time and enforces zero‑trust policies across GCP.
The latest Snapdragon chip delivers a 30% performance boost and advanced AI processing for next‑gen smartphones.
